title: 帮忙注册下
author: z1713836172
txt_content:
谁能帮帮我      我英语很渣   会英语的大大看不懂帮忙下  网址https://www.brick-force.com/en/start/free-to-play注测好后 
帮忙发到Q1713836172

replies.author: Danny仔
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 Danny仔 于 2012-11-6 20:52 编辑 

The Brick-Force Team只是這遊戲團隊= =,這信主要是說你注冊成功了...,你的用戶名應該是
你注冊時寫的(Nickname:名稱)這個吧...

replies.author: Danny仔
replies.txt_content:
還是建議自行注冊吧
幫你解釋意思= =
Email address:電郵地址
Email address(repeat):電郵地址(重覆輸入)
Password:密碼
Password(repeat):密碼(重覆輸入)
Nickname:名稱
下面的不用管了= =
除非你不要訂閱它的新聞
就不要剔Subscribe to our Newsletter(意思:訂閱我們的新聞)

还有注册好后邮箱里有Welcome to Brick-Force!
   Hello aitogsid,

The creation of your Brick-Force account was successful. Throw on your army pants and start your adventure.

Download Brick-Force now: http://www.brick-force.com

Or play directly in your browser: http://www.brick-force.com/playnow

Attention! Invite your friends to play together with them. You will receive the exclusive golden B-Hammer along the way. Spread your personal friendship link among your friends to register. As soon as at least 5 of them have been promoted to Rank Corporal, you will receive your very own B-Hammer.

Your personal friendship link is:

http://www.brick-force.com/register?fi=q0dgm0dauw 


If you have any further questions, please look at the Brick-Force website or contact our support at http://support.infernum.com/.

Have fun playing!

The Brick-Force Team  这是什么啊  是告诉我用户名吗  教教我 本人英语没学好  感谢大大了
